https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vAKV7V8iFGzaukFSrztABDgJcZq.jpg Wei is “Button man”, an expert cleaner for the Chinese Mafia, a man who arrives after a murder, takes care of the victim, disposing the body and leaves no evidence behind. Who would have thought one day, he would become a target of their list. (Mei Ah) Buttonman
